name: The Great Wars
description:
Info

- Note you will need friends or other people to play this as it is a multiplayer game!

- There are different minigames where you compete against other players. 

- After each minigame you earn or lose points. 

- Each match lasts 3 minigames.

Current minigames:

   - Free Fall: fall from a glass box to a small platform and dont hit red platforms

   - Free For All: Kill and get 3 points or die and lose a point

   - Free For All in Space: Same as normal FFA but with bigger gravity

   - Shooting Range: You only have 70 seconds to shoot targets, each target gives you a point. Act fast!

   - Shoot them all: You either spawn with a gun or dont. If you do, shoot everyone and earn points. If you don't have a gun, try to hide and don't get hit or you will lose 5 points! 

How do I join a game?

   - Someone has to host a game. 

   - The hoster can see a game room code, it is needed to join a room.

   - Room code is a 4 letters which are randomly generated.

   - When all players are in hoster can click the "Start" button to start the game.

Have fun!
